title: Sun conjunction Mars
summary: A surge of self-directed drive. Purpose and action line up, making it easier to push forward with confidence. The opportunity is decisive momentum without steamrolling yourself or others.

meaning.headline: Identity and initiative are fused, creating direct momentum.

frames.text: Sun–Mars conjunctions amplify willpower, making it easier to act on personal priorities.
Energy runs hot and focused, supporting decisive moves when direction is clear.
Confidence increases when purpose and effort are aligned.
This is a strong day for initiating something you intend to sustain.
Today guarantees victory or overrides all obstacles.

opportunities: Making a bold start on a priority
Claiming agency in areas that felt stalled
Setting a clear pace and sticking to it

do: Name the goal before you sprint toward it.
Direct extra energy into one meaningful task.
Move first, then adjust based on feedback.
Use physical outlets to prevent agitation.
avoid: Treating speed as proof of rightness
Assuming others are on your timetable

reusable_lines.text: When purpose and drive fuse, momentum comes quickly.
Lead with intention, not just adrenaline.

forbidden_claims: Guarantees of conquest, success, or dominance
allowed_framing: Process-based language: supports initiative, energizes action
Agency-forward framing: you choose where to aim this push
Contextual framing: momentum helps if paired with direction
